cab.content: Military Secret.1.019From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of Slate for India,2Gth July 191$.(Received 30th.) 10128. 26th July. Malleson telegraphs 24th July :-"The Bolshevik force now in Trans-Caspia contains large number of Persian subjects, many not enlisted. I have now! received overtures from them offering to desert and come into Persia if assured their belongings will not be taken from them. I do not think there is treachery behind this, though that is possible and must be guarded against."Kazim Beg is said to be in command at Askabad now."Have instructed Malleson to consult Tehran.
